verses.text: \w Ho|strong="H1945"\w*, every one that \w thirsteth|strong="H6771"\w*, \w come|strong="H3212"\w* ye to the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and he that hath no \w money|strong="H3701"\w*; \w come|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w buy|strong="H7666"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; yea, \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* without \w money|strong="H3701"\w* and without \w price|strong="H4242"\w*.

Wherefore do ye \w spend|strong="H8254"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* for \add that which is\add* not \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*? and your \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* for \add that which\add* \w satisfieth|strong="H7654"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*? \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* ye \add that which is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and let your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* itself in \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*.\f + \fr 55.2 \ft spend: Heb. weigh\f*

\w Incline|strong="H5186"\w* your \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w come|strong="H3212"\w* unto me: \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with you, \add even\add* the \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Behold, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him \add for\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* to the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*, a \w leader|strong="H5057"\w* and \w commander|strong="H6680"\w* to the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*.

Behold, thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \add that\add* thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not, and \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add that\add* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not thee shall \w run|strong="H7323"\w* unto thee because of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and for the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; for he hath \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w* thee.
¶ \w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* ye the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* while he may be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* ye upon him while he is \w near|strong="H7138"\w*:

Let the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and the \w unrighteous|strong="H0205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*: and let him \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he will have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon him; and to our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for he will \w abundantly|strong="H7235"\w* \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w*.\f + \fr 55.7 \ft the unrighteous…: Heb. the man of iniquity\f*\f + \fr 55.7 \ft abundantly…: Heb. multiply to pardon\f*

¶ For my \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \add are\add* not your \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*, neither \add are\add* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For \add as\add* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* are \w higher|strong="H1361"\w* than the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, so are my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w higher|strong="H1361"\w* than your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and my \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* than your \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w*.

For as the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* cometh \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and the \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w returneth|strong="H7725"\w* not thither, but \w watereth|strong="H7301"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and maketh it bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* and \w bud|strong="H6779"\w*, that it may \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* to the \w sower|strong="H2232"\w*, and \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w eater|strong="H0398"\w*:

So shall my \w word|strong="H1697"\w* be that goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: it shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto me \w void|strong="H7387"\w*, but it shall \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* that which I \w please|strong="H2654"\w*, and it shall \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* \add in the thing\add* whereto I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* it.

For ye shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*, and be led \w forth|strong="H2986"\w* with \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* and the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* shall break \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you into \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*, and all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w clap|strong="H4222"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

Instead of the \w thorn|strong="H5285"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the fir \w tree|strong="H1265"\w*, and instead of the \w brier|strong="H5636"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the myrtle \w tree|strong="H1918"\w*: and it shall be to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, for an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* \add that\add* shall not be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.
